FuncDef: This command configures the set of BMP monitoring stations for which BMP messages are to be sent, at the global BGP instance level, per group or for a particular neighbor.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies up to eight station names up to 32 characters. Allowed values are any string up to 32 characters long composed of printable,7-bit ASCII characters. If the string contains special characters (#, $, spaces, and so on), the entire string must be enclosed within double quotes.
